column5: We are planning a trip to LOTW when is best time to go?What is the best camp?We like to catch big pike and muskies,Will also fish walleyes for lunch and numbers.

If you want to get Muskies, Then Bill Sandy is the person you want to talk to. He has twenty years of experience and just opened a new camp out of the Northwest Angle. Try to reach him at 218 386 1099. He was featured at the Musky show a couple of weeks ago in Mpls and had a great talk. Good luck...Kaz

Nestor Falls area....( Stoney Portage) is excellent muskie waters.......Starts to heat up in July and gets better right on into September......walley fishing is also great....huge crappies in the fall and winter........
The sioux narrows area provides a multitude of fishing potential and is easy to get to try the Rod and Reel, its a family runs business and they are great people.[email protected]D'arcy
